data.comment: The match is underway in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 3, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Famalicao.
Benfica are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 7, In Vila Nova de Famalicao, Darwin Nunez (Benfica) misses the target with a header.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Luca Waldschmidt of Benfica gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 8, Famalicao have a goal kick.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
In the minute 12, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Benfica.
Throw-in Benfica.
In the minute 15, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Benfica throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
In the minute 18, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Benfica throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Luca Waldschmidt scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
That's a fine assist from Darwin Nunez.
In the minute 20, Guga for Famalicao drives towards goal at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Goal! Everton extends Benfica's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 21, Great play from Andre Almeida to set up the goal.
Benfica's Rafa Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In the minute 24, Benfica are coming forward and Darwin Nunez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Famalicao's half?
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Famalicao.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Famalicao's area.
In the minute 27, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
Ruben Dias (Benfica) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 29, Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Famalicao needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
Alex Grimaldo (Benfica) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Benfica.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao Famalicao's Jordao is caught offside.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Benfica.
Throw-in Benfica.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Ruben Dias (Benfica) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Free kick in a good position for Benfica!
In the minute 42, Alex Grimaldo puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Benfica throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 45, Can Famalicao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Famalicao's Jorge Pereira has been booked in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Joao Pedro Sousa is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao with Patrick William replacing Jorge Pereira.
In the minute 46, Abdul Ibrahim is on a sub for Calvin Verdonk for Famalicao.
In the minute 47, Famalicao's Patrick William breaks free at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Benfica a goal kick.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Famalicao.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 52, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Benfica throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Goal! Benfica extend their lead to 0-4 through Rafa Silva.
In the minute 52, Everton with an assist there.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Benfica.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Famalicao.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Famalicao.
Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Rafa Silva with Pizzi.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Famalicao.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 62, The home team have replaced Jordao with Matheus Clemente. This is the third substitution made today by Joao Pedro Sousa.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho blows against Benfica's Andre Almeida for offside.
Joao Pedro Sousa (Famalicao) is making a fourth substitution, with Ruben Del Campo replacing Toni Martinez.
In the minute 64, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Goal! Benfica extend their lead to 0-5 through Luca Waldschmidt.
Darwin Nunez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 68, Famalicao are back in the match in Vila Nova de Famalicao. Guga has scored to make it 1-5.
Ruben Lameiras with an assist there.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Free kick Benfica.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 71, Gabriel Appelt (Benfica) has received a first yellow card.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Benfica make their second substitution with Carlos Vinicius replacing Darwin Nunez.
In the minute 72, Nuno Tavares is replacing Alex Grimaldo for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Benfica's Carlos Vinicius is whistled for offside at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 75, Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Famalicao.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Diogo Goncalves is on a sub for Luca Waldschmidt for Benfica.
Julian Weigl is replacing Gabriel Appelt for Benfica at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Joao Pedro Sousa is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao with Walterson replacing Fernando Valenzuela.
In the minute 77, In Vila Nova de Famalicao Benfica attack through Pizzi. The finish is off target, however.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 81, Benfica to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Throw-in Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Benfica throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Famalicao's Riccieli is back in action after a slight knock.
Attention is being given to Famalicao’s Riccieli and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 84, Carlos Vinicius for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Free kick Famalicao.
In the minute 85, Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Famalicao are pushing forward but Walterson's finish is wide of the goal.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Benfica a goal kick.
In the minute 87, The match at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Riccieli, who is down injured.
Riccieli has recovered and rejoins the match in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ruben Lameiras (Famalicao) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Throw-in for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-5.
